trans-unit.source: Defines methods and properties for writing a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Define métodos y propiedades para escribir en <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> method in order to obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> writer for adding <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.AddFixedDocumentSequence%2A> método con el fin de obtener un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> escritor para agregar <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> contenido a un <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Agrega un nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> a la colección <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: A writer for outputting the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Un sistema de escritura para generar el nuevo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo, se muestra cómo utilizar el método <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddFixedDocument%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The image type to write.
trans-unit.target: El tipo de imagen que se va a escribir.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: Agrega una imagen <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> para <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.
trans-unit.target: El nuevo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail" /> de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: For example, the `imageType` might be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el `imageType` podría ser <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.

trans-unit.source: Only one thumbnail image can represent the document sequence as a whole (although individual documents and pages can have their own thumbnail images).
trans-unit.target: Sólo una imagen en miniatura puede representar la secuencia de documentos como un todo (aunque las páginas y documentos individuales pueden tener sus propias imágenes en miniatura).

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> is thrown if <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> is called when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> already has a thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" /> se produce si <see cref="M:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)" /> se llama cuando el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> ya tiene una vista en miniatura.

trans-unit.source: Flushes and closes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> writer.
trans-unit.target: Vacía y cierra el sistema de escritura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.Commit%2A> method to flush and close the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> writer.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.Commit%2A> método para vaciar y cerrar el <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence> escritor.

trans-unit.source: Sets a <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: Establece un <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> para la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> que se escribe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> that represents a default printing configuration for the sequence.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Printing.PrintTicket" /> que representa una configuración de impresión predeterminada para la secuencia.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: Al establecer esta propiedad no valida ni modificar especificado <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> para un determinado <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a specified printer.
trans-unit.target: Si es necesario, utilice el <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> método para crear un <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-específico <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> que es válido para una impresora determinada.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.PrintTicket%2A> property to associate a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> with the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceWriter.PrintTicket%2A> propiedad que se va a asociar un <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> con el <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" />que se va a escribir.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> that is being written.
trans-unit.target: El [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] de la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence" /> que se está escribiendo.
